alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:21AM EST until December 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM CONTINUES TODAY... .A nor`easter continues to strengthen in the Gulf of Maine this morning. Moderate to occasionally heavy snowfall is also continuing across the western Maine mountains and foothills southwestward into the White Mountains. The highest snowfall totals are expected for these areas, though light to moderate snow will continue elsewhere through midday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Strafford, Eastern Hillsborough, and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be slick due to snow accumulations on roads. Wet snow at times may lead to downed tree limbs, resulting in isolated to scattered power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
